alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Nemaha; Pawnee; Richardson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 4:59AM CST until February 22 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, a mix of freezing drizzle and light snow. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Johnson, Nemaha, Pawnee and Richardson Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution if traveling, and allow extra time to reach your destination. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
